author: Anthony Gharib
title: NFL Week 17 uniforms: Cowboys' navy look, Ravens rock purple pants - ESPN
text: Traditional uniforms dominate Week 17 of the 2023 NFL season as the calendar year comes to a close. The [Dallas Cowboys](/nfl/team/_/name/dal/dallas-cowboys) will wear their navy threads against the [Detroit Lions](/nfl/team/_/name/det/detroit-lions) in a Saturday night matchup. The [Arizona Cardinals](/nfl/team/_/name/ari/arizona-cardinals) are going all white, while the [Jacksonville Jaguars](/nfl/team/_/name/jax/jacksonville-jaguars) break out their teal jerseys for the second time this month. The [Miami Dolphins](/nfl/team/_/name/mia/miami-dolphins) and [Baltimore Ravens](/nfl/team/_/name/bal/baltimore-ravens) have arguably the top uniform matchup of the weekend. Here are the uniforms for all NFL teams in action Saturday, Sunday and Monday: [Arizona Cardinals](/nfl/team/_/name/ari/arizona-cardinals) Helmet: White Jersey: White Pants: White kicking off NYE right ‚ú®‚Äî Arizona Cardinals (@AZCardinals) [pic.twitter.com/wscNjIq1fq] [December 27, 2023] [Atlanta Falcons](/nfl/team/_/name/atl/atlanta-falcons) Helmet: Black Jersey: White Pants: Black NYE fit üéä‚Äî Atlanta Falcons (@AtlantaFalcons) [December 28, 2023] [Baltimore Ravens](/nfl/team/_/name/bal/baltimore-ravens) Helmet: Black Jersey: Black Pants: Purple It's time üòà‚Äî Baltimore Ravens (@Ravens) [@Invisalign] [pic.twitter.com/cvlJJwrXuv] [December 28, 2023] [Buffalo Bills](/nfl/team/_/name/buf/buffalo-bills) Helmet: White Jersey: Blue Pants: White Our New Year's Eve look. üòç‚Äî Buffalo Bills (@BuffaloBills) [#NEvsBUF]| [#BillsMafia] [pic.twitter.com/Tbupa61oXR] [December 28, 2023] [Carolina Panthers](/nfl/team/_/name/car/carolina-panthers) Helmet: Silver Jersey: White Pants: TBA [Chicago Bears](/nfl/team/_/name/chi/chicago-bears) Helmet: Navy blue Jersey: Navy blue Pants: TBA [Cincinnati Bengals](/nfl/team/_/name/cin/cincinnati-bengals) Helmet: Orange Jersey: White Pants: White Our Kansas City look.‚Äî Cincinnati Bengals (@Bengals) [pic.twitter.com/YbBvrZtVTh] [December 27, 2023] [Dallas Cowboys](/nfl/team/_/name/dal/dallas-cowboys) Helmet: Silver Jersey: Navy blue Pants: White [Denver Broncos](/nfl/team/_/name/den/denver-broncos) Helmet: Navy blue Jersey: Orange Pants: White [Detroit Lions](/nfl/team/_/name/det/detroit-lions) Helmet: Silver Jersey: White Pants: White Last‚Äî Detroit Lions (@Lions) [#Lions]gameday of 2023!
